house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1988 has 4 bedroom(s), 3.5 bath(s) , 3 car garage and approximately 4100 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Assoc Realty Coldwell Banker Assoc Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
